message.content:
1. A total of 45 subjects were involved in the procedure.
2. Each subject received a single injection of CPM-26.
3. The injection of CPM-26 was administered on one side of the face.
4. Each subject also received a single injection of VYC-20.
5. The injection of VYC-20 was administered on the contralateral side of the face.

messages.content:
Statement: A total of 45 subjects received a single 2 mL injection of CPM-26 on one side and VYC-20 on the contralateral side of the face.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
